```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggmap)
library(choroplethr)
library(revgeo)
```


```{r}
data<-read_csv("crimeNYC2019.csv")
crime<-data%>%
  select(ARREST_DATE,ARREST_BORO,Latitude,Longitude)%>%
  mutate(index=row_number())%>%
  drop_na()
save(crime, file="crime.Rdata")
```
